adjustAdminAccess(address,bool).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.access: Whether the address has admin access or not.

adjustTransferability(uint256,bool).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.tokenId: The token id for the specific game item being adjusted.
params.transferable: The address of the new admin

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

burn(address,uint256,uint256).details: Only addresses listed in allowedBurningAddresses are authorized to call this function.

params.account: The account from which the game items will be burned.
params.amount: The amount of game items to burn.
params.tokenId: The ID of the game item.

params.treasuryAddress_: Address of admin signer for messages.

returns._0: URI where the contract metadata is stored.

createGameItem(string,string,bool,bool,u.details: Only the admins are authorized to call this function.

params.dailyAllowance: The daily allowance for the game item.
params.finiteSupply: Determines if the game item has a finite supply.
params.itemPrice: The price of the game item.
params.itemsRemaining: The number of remaining items for the game item.
params.name_: The name of the game item.
params.tokenURI: The URI of the game item.
params.transferable: Boolean of whether or not the game item can be transferred

params.tokenId: The token id for the specific game item being queried.

returns._0: remaining number of items that can be minted for the day.

instantiateNeuronContract(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.nrnAddress: The address of the Neuron contract.

params.quantity: The quantity of game items to mint.
params.tokenId: The ID of the game item to mint.
The ID of the game item.

returns._0: Remaining items for the queried token ID.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Added a check to see if the game item is transferable.

setAllowedBurningAddresses(address).details: Only the admins are authorized to call this function.

params.newBurningAddress: The address to allow for burning.

setTokenURI(uint256,string).details: Only the admins are authorized to call this function.

params._tokenURI: The token id to be set
params.tokenId: The token id for the specific game item being queried.

transferOwnership(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.newOwnerAddress: The address of the new owner

returns._0: Total number of unique game tokens.

params.tokenId: The token id for the specific game item being queried.

returns._0: tokenURI The URI for the game item metadata.

adjustAdminAccess(address,bool).notice: Adjusts admin access for a user.

adjustTransferability(uint256,bool).notice: Adjusts whether the game item can be transferred or not

allGameItemAttributes(uint256).notice: List of all gameItemAttribute structs representing all game items.

allowanceRemaining(address,uint256).notice: Mapping of address to tokenId to get remaining allowance.

allowedBurningAddresses(address).notice: Mapping tracking addresses allowed to burn game items.

burn(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Burns a specified amount of game items from an account.

constructor.notice: Sets the owner address, the delegated address and the isAdmin mapping is set to true for the owner address.

contractURI().notice: Returns the URI where the contract metadata is stored.

createGameItem(string,string,bool,bool,u.notice: Creates a new game item with the specified attributes.

dailyAllowanceReplenishTime(address,uint.notice: Mapping of address to tokenId to get replenish timestamp.

getAllowanceRemaining(address,uint256).notice: Gets the amount of a game item that a user is still able to mint for the day

instantiateNeuronContract(address).notice: Sets the Neuron contract address and instantiates the contract.

isAdmin(address).notice: Mapping tracking addresses allowed to manage game items.

mint(uint256,uint256).notice: Mints game items and assigns them to the caller.
